Paracetamol:
Indicated in adults and children aged 10 to 18.
 One to two tablets every 4-6 hours as required.
 Adverse effects of Paracetamol are rare but hypersensitivity including skin rash.
 Help treat pain and reduce a high temperature
Ibuprofen:
Used to treat mild-moderate pain, fever, and inflammation.
 When ibuprofen is administered immediately after a meal there is a slight reduction in the absorption rate but there is no change in the extent of the absorption.
 Take with food. Food reduces irritation.
 The usual dose for adults is one or two 200mg tablets or capsules 3 times a day.
